scripts.build:babel: ( rm -r build || true ) && mkdir build && babel src --out-dir build && babel node_modules/probot --out-dir build/probot
scripts.build: npm run build:babel && npm run build:npm
scripts.deploy: npm run build && zip --symlinks -9 -x lambda-function.zip -r lambda-function * && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name hm-linter --region us-east-1 --zip-file fileb://lambda-function.zip
